comment: If the domain of a function exists, so does the function. Part of Theorem 4.15(v) of [Monk1] p. 46. This theorem is derived using the Axiom of Replacement in the form of ~ fnex . (Note: Any resemblance between F.U.N.E.X. and "Have You Any Eggs" is purely a coincidence originated by Swedish chefs.) (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.)
